  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15/9/-10

=head3 yw-count-other ('week' w 'of' Y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = week 6 of 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = week 51 of 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = week 37 of -10


=head2 Miscellaneous

=head3 Prefers 24 hour time?

Yes

=head3 Local first day of the week

1 (साॅम्वारा)

=head2 Strftime Patterns

=head3 %c (%a %b %e %H:%M:%S %Y) - date time format

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = मंगाड़ा माहाका लेञ्जु  5 18:30:30 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = सुकुरु वारा पान्डे लेञ्जु 22 09:05:02 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = सान्नि वारा बोदो लेञ्जु 15 04:44:23 -10

=head3 %x (%m/%d/%y) - date format

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 02/05/08
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12/22/95
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 09/15/10

=head3 %X (%H:%M:%S) - time format

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44:23

=head1 SUPPORT

See L<DateTime::Locale>.

=cut
